question: You are studying for a qualification, and would like some time off work to complete it. Write a letter to your manager. In your letter, ask for some tome off to complete a qualification, suggest what will you do later at work if you have time off,say how will the qualification helps your job or company.
text: I am writing this to seek a fortnight off at work starting from the 7th of April to 21st of April. I have 10 days of annual leave balance which I have saved to be utilised at this particular time.

As you are already aware that I am engaged in Oracle courses to attain certification, I have to submit a project for the final exam to be Oracle certified and I need this break to complete the project.

Despite of being absent from the job, I will be available for taking emergency phone calls and to attend client meetings. Besides, I endeavour to perform on weekends and extend my weekday working hours to compensate the same. I have also talked to Sim and Joe, my colleagues, who have agreed to undertake a part of my work in the meantime.

In this way, my absence would not impact the work negatively but, would be beneficial for the company in terms that I would be another Oracle certified employee. Also, the fusion training which our team was recently discussing about, I can be a perfect volunteer to lead here as I believe by the time I should be capable of.
Thank you for your time and consideration.
I am looking forward to receiving your approval for the leave.
